dashboard.label: Search For Video Help
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_3ZIZ5fSL":{"type":"splunk.table","title":"Potentially Useful Videos","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_VWsB13B1"},"eventHandlers":[{"type":"drilldown.setToken","options":{"tokens":[{"token":"url","key":"row.url.value"}]}}]},"viz_o87iOOQi":{"type":"splunk.markdown","options":{"markdown":"Double Click URL and then right click and open in a new tab"}}},"dataSources":{"ds_HKqD5iYJ":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup splunk_commands.csv | fields command"},"name":"Splunk Field Commands"},"ds_VWsB13B1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| inputlookup lame_youtube_channel.csv 
| search (title="$command_name$" 
AND about="*$key_phrase$*") 
OR (title=$command_name$ 
AND title="*$key_phrase$*")
| table title, about, url"},"name":"Search Youtube Videos"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-24h@h,now"},"title":"Global Time Range"},"input_WKOgYQ1K":{"options":{"items":">frame(label, value) | prepend(formattedStatics) | objects()","defaultValue":"*","token":"command_name"},"title":"Dropdown Input Title","type":"input.dropdown","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_HKqD5iYJ"},"context":{"formattedConfig":{"number":{"prefix":""}},"formattedStatics":">statics | formatByType(formattedConfig)","statics":[["All"],["*"]],"label":">primary | seriesByName("command") | renameSeries("label") | formatByType(formattedConfig)","value":">primary | seriesByName("command") | renameSeries("value") | formatByType(formattedConfig)"}},"input_HYDVFiY4":{"options":{"defaultValue":"*","token":"key_phrase"},"title":"Key Phrase Search","type":"input.text"}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale"},"structure":[{"item":"viz_3ZIZ5fSL","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":30,"w":1190,"h":300}},{"item":"viz_o87iOOQi","type":"block","position":{"x":370,"y":0,"w":430,"h":30}}],"globalInputs":["input_global_trp","input_WKOgYQ1K","input_HYDVFiY4"]},"description":"","title":"Search For Video Help"}
